document_data.name: Ghost Leopard
document_data.mainbody: The '''Ghost Leopard''' province was found in the northwest region of the [[Land of the Yak-Men]] in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite dragon/241/Campaign Classics: The Roof of the World}}
document_data.Geography: This province of the [[Yikarian Empire]] was dominated by the [[World Pillar Mountains]] on its eastern side and foothills and rugged terrain along the [[River Ruin]] in the west and north.
document_data.Inhabitants: Aside from the [[yak-folk]] who controlled the region, the Ghost Leopard province was home to a large population of [[marrash]] whose eyries were scattered throughout the mountain peaks. These dangerous creatures were close allies with the yak-folk and served as aerial scouts for the area.
